mapper.select: SELECT /* AppzineVolListMapper.xml, selectAppzineVolList, SAC : 유시혁 , 2014-02-18 */ A.APPZN_NO , A.APPZN_VOL , A.TITLE , A.RNUM , A.TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY A.ISSUDAY DESC, A.APPZN_NO DESC) AS RNUM , COUNT (1) OVER () AS TOTAL_COUNT , A.APPZN_NO , A.APPZN_VOL , A.ISSUDAY , A.TITLE , A.BG_IMG_PATH , A.THEME_HTML , A.EXPO_YN , A.POPULAR_TITL_IMG_480 , A.POPULAR_TITL_IMG_800 , A.NEW_TITL_IMG_480 , A.NEW_TITL_IMG_800 , A.EVENT_NM , A.EVENT_URL , A.EVENT_IMG_480 , A.EVENT_IMG_800 , A.TITLE_IMG , A.THEME_UP_IMG , A.REG_DT FROM TB_DP_APPZN_NEW A WHERE A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND #{count} + #{offset} - 1 ORDER BY RNUM
